To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private InvertedHammer _invertedhammer;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_invertedhammer = InvertedHammer(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_invertedhammer.IsReady)
{
    var period = _invertedhammer.Period.Value;
    var current = _invertedhammer.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.invertedhammer = self.InvertedHammer(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.invertedhammer.IsReady:
    period = self.invertedhammer.Period.Value
    current = self.invertedhammer.Current.Value
